description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A modern incarnation of the classic slide puzzle game. Play against friends or against your own personal best! Completion time is the name of the game!
description.short: A modern incarnation of the classic slide puzzle game. Play against friends or against your own personal best! Completion time is the name of the game!
